name: KadmusArts
tag_list: festival, entertainment-news, music, concert, bands, dance, theatre, culture, entertainment-industry
overview:
KadmusArts.com is the online connection to every kind of music, dance, and theatre festival in the world.

The site hosts content from festival presenters and promoters, artists and bands, audiences and fans in 154 countries.

KadmusArts.comâ€™s database feeds (and archives) daily global entertainment news stories, free and discounted festival ticket offers, up-to-the-minute live Twitter feeds from festivals, podcast interviews with festival artists and producers, weekly feature stories on festivals and artists, blogs on international arts/culture trends and festival food, themed playlists, and an open forum for job postings, special events, workshops, and travel opportunities.

KadmusArts also creates and distribute customized online content packages (Content Creation/Syndication) for arts, media, and entertainment industry clients.
